description: Recover (butterfly) roof in genuine slate and lead. New solar thermal/photovoltaic panels to roof. conservation access rooflight to roof. double height glazed rear extension, all in painted metal. Re-constructed and extended closet wing. A half-level space to be formed below the rear WC. Adjustments to fenestration including replacement of LGF front window. adjustments to openings in partitions, door openings. Removal of later applied mouldings internally. Lowering floor level to ancillary space under front steps. Conversion of 1No Vault into storage room inc. lowering central floor level. Alterations to front garden including reconstruction of steps and landing, steps to lightwell; repositioned ironwork to match original, adjustments to paving surfaces. Rear garden landscaping inc. reconstructed steps to terrace, extended lower terrace, rear paved seating area. trellis to rear boundary walls in timber or woven willow.
